H0.text: They vibrate quickly in place is the best description of the motion of molecules in the gaseous state.

H1.text: They spread apart to fill their container best describes the motion of molecules in the gaseous state.

H2.text: They move at the same speed as in a liquid is the best description of the motion of molecules in the gaseous state.

H3.text: They move slowly over one another is the best description of the motion of molecules in the gaseous state.

A4.text: The gas particles are in constant, random motion, moving in all directions.

A5.text: The sum of the volume of the individual gas molecules is negligible compared to the volume of the container of the gas.
